definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jos 2:18 thread, cord, line (NH id.; Ar. xayt.un, Aram. h.owt.o0, [[חוּטָא]])—´[[ח]] abs. Ge 14:23 + 2 t.; cstr. Jos 2:18+ 3 t.;—

thread, as easily broken Ju Jdg 16:12 (sim.); as composing a rope or cord; [[הַשָּׁנִי הַזֶּה]] ´[[תִּקְוַת ח]] Jos 2:18 (JE) this cord of scarlet thread (lit. the cord of this thread of scarlet); prob. also [[מִחוּט וְעַד שְׂרוֹךְ נַעַל]] Ge 14:23 from a thread to a sandal-thong; in sim. ´[[כְּח]] [[הַשָּׁנִי]] Ct So 4:3 like a thread of scarlet are thy lips.
line, as measure of length 1Ki 7:15 and a line of twelve cubits surrounded (i.e. would surround) it (cf. [[קָו]] v:1Ki 7:23), so Je 52:21.
